tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE climate_data(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE climate_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE weather_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(50),
  event_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE climate_patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(50),
  trend_description TEXT,
  prediction_date DATE
)
